title: The Human face of the Pacific
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/O'Rourke, Dennis
description: A series of six documentaries covering six Pacific nations and territories, giving a wide-ranging view of contemporary Pacific society. It shows the variety of ways of life from subsistence to urbanization and the challenges from outside of what has been called the "Pacific way".
